name: Fish Cutlet
description: Crispy fried white fish fillet served with tartar sauce and rice, popular in Korean-style restaurants.

name: Spam Kimchi Fried Rice
description: Korean-style fried rice made with spam, kimchi, and gochujang, often topped with a fried egg.

name: Hainanese Chicken Rice
description: Steamed chicken served with fragrant rice cooked in chicken broth, accompanied by chili sauce and soy dressing.

name: Laksa
description: Spicy coconut curry noodle soup with shrimp, fish cake, tofu, and bean sprouts, a signature Malaysian and Singaporean dish.

name: Indian Butter Chicken
description: Creamy Indian curry made with tender chicken cooked in butter, tomato sauce, and aromatic spices, served with rice or naan.

name: Grilled Chicken with Mashed Potato
description: Juicy grilled chicken breast served with creamy mashed potatoes and seasonal vegetables.

name: Salmon Steak with Cream Sauce
description: Pan-seared salmon fillet served with rich cream sauce and sauted vegetables.

name: Shrimp Risotto
description: Creamy Italian-style risotto cooked with shrimp, butter, parmesan, and herbs.

name: Grilled Pork Chop with Vegetables
description: Tender pork chop grilled with garlic butter and served with sauted vegetables and rice.
